title: The last vvill and testament of the Marquis d'Ancre Together with his araignment. His obsequies. His wifes teares on his death. The re-union of the King with his men of warre. The rousing of the soldat françois. All declaring the diuine iudgement of God on the death of the said Marshall d'Ancre. Out of the French copies printed at Paris and Roan.
author: Concini, Concino, maréchal d'Ancre, ca. 1575-1617, attributed name.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Felix Kyngston for William Arondell, at the Angell in Pauls Church-yard,
